0x310D0271.name: GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_COLLECTION_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS

params.name: collection
params.description: Name of the collection. Empty string for the base game collection. See [GET_PED_COLLECTION_NAME](#\_0xFED5D83A) in order to list all available collections.

0x310D0271.description: An analogue of [GET_NUMBER_OF_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATIONS](#\_0x27561561732A7842) that returns number of drawable variations inside a single collection instead of the total number across all collections.
0x310D0271.resultsDescription: Number of drawables available in the given collection. Returns 0 if ped or collection does not exist.
